EmailTemplate.name: NHANES-DH
EmailTemplate.subject: DRE: NHANES
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
DRE-NHANES
DOC NHANES
Access and agreegate data via a user-friendly interface.
DOC NHANES offers online, user-friendly access to the rich content of the Center for Disease Control (CDC) National Health and Nutrition Examination Survey (NHANES).
OUR SERVICES
Conforms to NHANES Analytic Guidelines by selecting the appropriate weight variables and appending (combining multiple survey cycles) as well as merging (combining multiple datasets) automatically Provides break-down analysis by categories like demography, treatment or time period Calculates and plots prevalence, distribution, or continuous data (e.g. blood pressure, cholesterol level). Population estimates are also included in the form of “statements” Forecasts using linear or other regression models Outputs data in graphical and tabular format Exports raw data from graphical and tabular reports for additional operations elsewhere Outputs data in graphical and tabular format Exports raw data from graphical and tabular reports for additional operations elsewhere Retrieves variables quickly using its auto-complete search functionality
DOC NHANES offers online, user-friendly access to the rich data content of NHANS that can be accessed anytime and anywhere. The interface displays straightforward pull-screens, keyword searches, and the option to export raw data. Users can employ the Variable Browser for easy search and assessment and variables within the NHANES data set.
Lean more
Visit our website and request a free demo
GET STARTED
